WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing - not an issue - 4pT8 really is better than 2pT9 ...
WorkItem.Description: OK why does rawr say that Valorous Plagueheart Leggings is better then Valorous Deathbringer Leggings?
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Says Val Plagueheart is better than Val Deathbringer

Comments.Message: I have downloaded your file and looked over it.  My suspicision is that it values the plagueheart more because equipping those will give you 4t8 (300 Spirit on LT) which is woth more points then the 2t9 (20% damage on UA).  You are using the glyph of LT, correct?
